name: Aceternity UI
description: Cards stack on top of each other after some interval. Perfect for showing testimonials.

props.Description: The class name of the child component.

props.Type: Array<{id: number; name: string; designation: string; content: React.ReactNode;}>
props.Description: The cards that you want to render in the stack effect
The offset by which you want the cards to stack
The scale by which you want the cards to stack

usage_notes: Cards stack on top of each other after some interval. Perfect for showing testimonials.
